title: Pre-game toxicity?
body:
Are conversations like below in pre-game chat toxic? Or acceptable banter?

*REDACTED* : karthus mid
*REDACTED* : if you dont give me mid then ill just out cs the adc

There is a lot more, but it's the same that follows any of these sorts of interactions.

replies.body: I wouldn't classify that as toxic, just someone being a girl about being a support. Or they instalocked but didn't get their lane so they are stuck as a jungle Vel'Koz
Some people are dicks. Some of these dicks play lol.
